jd: From: Manohar, Cloudingest manohar@cloudingest.com Reply to: manohar@cloudingest.com Role : Data Engineer Location : Remote Need Passport Number 9+ Years of Industry Work Experience in Data Engineering / ETL / BI 5+ Years of experience in Big Data Stack – Hadoop, Hive, Spark (Python or Scala) along with basic shell-scripting and basic Python scripting Very strong skills in SQL. Should have bend of mind in understanding business data, product line, end to end flow of data, nature of data etc. from Business Perspective. Experience extracting data from a variety of sources, and a desire to expand those skills (working knowledge in SQL and Spark is mandatory) Excellent Data Analysis skills. Must be comfortable with querying and analyzing large amount of data on Hadoop HDFS using Hive and Spark. Preferably, the candidate must have experience building applications using Google Cloud Platform-related frameworks such as DataFlow/DataProc/PubSub. Excellent Communication Skills to Understand and Pass on Requirements.
